review: Heaton & Associates, LLC negotiated the myriad avenues of medical providers and insurance reimbursement rules and procedures with unparalleled professionalism following injury sustained by my wife in a traffic accident. She required consequent medical care and lengthy rehabilitation. Heaton & Associates stayed atop matters and consummated all issues during the necessarily long process.
